articles.title: Polymarket odds of Bitcoin under $55K at 72% as BTC market cap dives
articles.summary: Bitcoin traders are betting heavily against a recovery, with Polymarket showing 72% odds that BTC will stay below $55K as the cryptocurrency's market cap continues its slide. The lopsided betting action signals either a consensus short opportunity or a potential contrarian play for bettors willing to fade the crowd when sentiment gets this bearish.

articles.title: Tradeweb Partners with Kalshi to Bring Prediction Markets to Institutions
articles.summary: Tradeweb, the massive institutional bond trading platform, just partnered with Kalshi to give Wall Street firms direct access to prediction markets. This could flood regulated prediction markets with institutional money and legitimacy, potentially creating the liquidity breakthrough the space has been waiting for.

articles.title: X to Implement Mandatory Disclosure Features for Polymarket and Kalshi Advertisements
articles.summary: X will require advertisers from prediction markets like Polymarket and Kalshi to include mandatory disclosure information in their ads. This move signals that prediction market advertising is hitting mainstream social media hard enough to trigger platform-level regulation, which could legitimize the space while making customer acquisition more expensive.

articles.title: Will Bitcoin’s Price Hit $50,000 This Year? Here’s What Bettors Think After Trump Tariffs Spark $465M Liquidations
articles.summary: Trump's tariff announcements triggered $465M in crypto liquidations, sending Bitcoin tumbling and raising fresh questions about whether it can still reach $50,000 before year-end. The massive position wipeout shows how quickly geopolitical moves can reshape betting odds on crypto milestones, making those year-end Bitcoin markets suddenly look a lot riskier.

articles.title: Opinion | If feds won’t regulate prediction markets, states must try
articles.summary: A columnist argues that state governments should step in to regulate prediction markets since federal authorities aren't doing the job. This could create a patchwork of conflicting state rules that would fragment the market and make it harder for platforms to operate nationally.

articles.title: Team vs. MOUZ Odds & Predictions (Feb. 22, 2026)
articles.summary: Team vs. MOUZ faces off on February 22nd, 2026, with oddsmakers already setting lines for what appears to be a competitive esports matchup. The betting action will reveal whether the market sees this as a coin flip or if sharp money identifies an edge that casual bettors are missing.

articles.title: $10 Kalshi Promo Code SILIVE upgraded in CA for Celtics vs. Lakers tonight!
articles.summary: Kalshi upgraded their $10 promo code SILIVE for California users ahead of tonight's Celtics-Lakers game. The timing suggests they're pushing hard to capture West Coast market share during a marquee matchup that will drive heavy betting volume.

articles.title: Opinion | Minnesota must gather its wits about prediction markets
articles.summary: Minnesota lawmakers are apparently fumbling their approach to prediction markets regulation. If they botch this like other states have with sports betting rollouts, it could set back legal prediction markets nationwide and push more trading offshore.

articles.title: TN Court Grants Kalshi’s Motion For Preliminary Injunction On Sports Predictions
articles.summary: A Tennessee court granted Kalshi's preliminary injunction request, likely allowing the prediction market platform to continue offering sports betting contracts while legal challenges play out. This ruling gives Kalshi breathing room to expand its sports markets and could set precedent for how courts treat prediction markets that blur the line with traditional sports betting.

articles.title: You Can Bet on It
articles.summary: Betting markets are expanding into new territories, letting people wager on everything from celebrity breakups to congressional votes. This flood of new betting options creates more opportunities for sharp bettors to find mispriced odds while giving prediction markets fresh data on public sentiment.

articles.title: Polymarket Bitcoin Price Prediction Says $75K, But Charts Don't
articles.summary: Polymarket traders are betting Bitcoin will hit $75,000 while technical analysis suggests the charts tell a different story. The disconnect highlights how prediction markets can diverge from traditional analysis methods, creating potential arbitrage opportunities for savvy bettors who can read both signals.

articles.title: The rise of Polymarket, the cryptocurrency-based betting site for current events
articles.summary: Polymarket has emerged as the dominant platform for betting on real-world events using cryptocurrency, from election outcomes to celebrity gossip. The platform's growth signals that crypto-native prediction markets are finally hitting mainstream adoption, potentially reshaping how we aggregate information about future events.
